verbs.description: [ARG0: i] [V: flew] [ARG1: on the longest flight in the world that lasted nearly 18 hours and covered 10 000 miles] singapore airlines relaunched the longest flight in the world between newark liberty international airport just outside new york city and changi airport in singapore the flight covers 10 000 miles and can take more than 18 hours world 18 hours
